title: Philosophy Student Challenges Theologian Father to Engage the Meaning Crisis, Faith and Unbelief
description:
Bas (the father) wrote a book to try to explain the Apostle's Creed to generation struggling with the Meaning Crisis but his son (Aron) thinks he needs a new approach and so wanted him to talk to me. They met Job (because they're all Dutch) and he came along for the conversation. 

We got into Jordan Peterson, John Vervaeke, Jonathan Pageau, Job's recent decision to fully convert by taking the Eucharist at his church, both Aron's and Bas' faith stories.
Click here to meetup with other channel viewers for conversation https://discord.gg/WkkHMTt The link will prompt you to download the software for this free group messaging service. This link updates every 100 users so look for the most recent videos if this link doesn't work.

If you want to schedule a one-on-one conversation check here. https://paulvanderklay.me/2019/08/06/converzations-with-pvk/

For the audio podcast mirror on Podbean http://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/

To listen to this on ITunes https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/paul-vanderklays-podcast/id1394314333 

If you need the RSS feed for your podcast player https://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/feed/
